Objectives.Description: Don't get spotted or Julian will start the bomb countdown

HUDTemplate.display: 47, you've been spotted! The bomb countdown has started. Hurry up and find the bomb detonator!

Objectives.BriefingText: Don't get spotted or Julian will start the bomb countdown

Objectives._comment: ----- Retrieve the Mine Disarm Device with timer-----
Objectives.Description: Defuse the bomb hidden in the hotel
Objectives.BriefingName: Defuse the bomb hidden in the hotel
Objectives.BriefingText: Defuse the bomb hidden in the hotel
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Defuse the bomb hidden in the hotel

HUDTemplate.display: Defuse the bomb hidden in the hotel

Objectives._comment: ----- Don't kill or Pacify Jackie Carrington -----
Objectives.BriefingName: Don't kill or pacify your contact
Objectives.BriefingText: Don't kill or pacify your contact
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Don't kill or pacify your contact

HUDTemplate.display: Don't kill or pacify your contact

Objectives.BriefingText: Go to the reception and check in as Tobias Reaper. Take your room keycard to receive the next instructions to meet your contact.
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Go to the reception and check in as Tobias Reaper. Take your room keycard to receive the next instructions to meet your contact.

HUDTemplate.display: Retrieve your room keycard at the reception to receive the next instructions to meet your contact.

Objectives.BriefingText: Go to the bar on the first floor, blend in as a client and meet your contact to retrieve the target's room keycard. She'll call you her 'next ex-husband'
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Go to the bar on the first floor, blend in as a client and meet your contact to retrieve the target's room keycard. She'll call you her 'next ex-husband'

HUDTemplate.display: Meet your contact at the bar on the first floor to retrieve the target's room keycard
Eliminate Julian with an electrocution accident

Objectives.BriefingText: Jackie Carrington sedated the target in his room. Eliminate him. You must make it look like an electric accident or there will be suspicions on Jackie.

Objectives.BriefingName: Pacify and stash the stalker in a container for extraction
Objectives.BriefingText: 47, it seems someone is watching your contact. He was sitting next to you at the bar when you met her. Pacify and stash him in a container for extraction and interrogation
Objectives.LongBriefingText: 47, it seems someone is watching your contact. He was sitting next to you at the bar when you met her. Pacify and stash him in a container for extraction and interrogation

HUDTemplate.display: 47, it seems someone is watching your contact. Pacify and stash the stalker in a container for interrogation

Objectives.BriefingName: Eliminate All Militia Soldiers in the Medow Brown Lounge

HUDTemplate.display: He's not alone... Eliminate all Militia Soldiers in the Medow Brown Lounge to clear the area

Objectives.BriefingText: The stalker was not alone... it looks like a setup, 47. Eliminate All Militia Soldiers in the Medow Brown Lounge to clear the area
Objectives.LongBriefingText: The stalker was not alone... it looks like a setup, 47. Eliminate All Militia Soldiers in the Medow Brown Lounge to clear the area

Objectives.BriefingText: Eliminate All Militia Soldiers in the Delivery Area
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Eliminate All Militia Soldiers in the Delivery Area

Objectives.Description: The stalker began to talk... A man disguised as a high ranking security guard in the basement has the detonator, retrieve it now!
Objectives.BriefingText: The stalker began to talk... A man disguised as a high ranking security guard in the basement has the detonator, retrieve it now!
Objectives.LongBriefingText: The stalker began to talk... A man disguised as a high ranking security guard in the basement has the detonator, retrieve it now!

HUDTemplate.display: The stalker began to talk... A man disguised as a high ranking security guard in the basement has the detonator, retrieve it now!

Objectives.LongBriefingText: 47, Julian had a plan B: he unleashed a deadly virus in the kitchen! Eliminate the two infected and hide them in the freezer. We'll extract their bodies later. Hurry up before it's too late!

HUDTemplate.display: Julian had a plan B: he has infected two people with a virus. Hide them in the freezer to prevent the spread

Objectives.BriefingText: 47, Julian had a plan B: he unleashed a deadly virus in the kitchen! Two people are infected. Eliminate the two infected and hide them in the freezer. We'll extract their bodies later.
Eliminate Tharn Srisai and hide him in the freezer
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Eliminate Tharn Srisai and hide him in the freezer

Objectives.BriefingText: Eliminate Naruemon Thanom and hide her in the freezer
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Eliminate Naruemon Thanom and hide her in the freezer

Objectives.BriefingName: Do a self-injection of Anti-Virus, now!
Objectives.BriefingText: Do a self-injection of Anti-Virus, now!
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Do a self-injection of Anti-Virus, now!

HUDTemplate.display: Do a self-injection of Anti-Virus, now!

Objectives.Name: Erase your tracks from the Security System Recorder
Objectives.Description: Erase your tracks from the Security System Recorder
Objectives.BriefingText: Take the tapes from the Security System Recorder. We need them intact.
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Take the tapes from the Security System Recorder. We need them intact.

HUDTemplate.display: Take the tapes from the Security System Recorder. We need them intact.

Objectives.BriefingText: 47... Wait... We're watching the security tapes. Jackie Carrington hid the bomb. She's is the real 'Julian'. She fooled us but she doesn't know you know. Finish her once and for all
Objectives.LongBriefingText: 47... Wait... We're watching the security tapes. Jackie Carrington hid the bomb. She's is the real 'Julian'. She fooled us but she doesn't know you know. Finish her once and for all

HUDTemplate.display: 47... Wait... We're watching the security tapes. Jackie Carrington hid the bomb. She's is the real 'Julian'. Finish her once and for all

Objectives.BriefingText: Eliminate Jackie's accomplice who covered her tracks
Objectives.LongBriefingText: Eliminate Jackie's accomplice who covered her tracks

HUDTemplate.display: Eliminate Jackie's accomplice who covered her tracks

Metadata.Title: Traditions of the Trade
Metadata.Description: Welcome to Bangkok, 47.At the Thermal Bath Hotel in Bangkok, a peace summit is being held. Attending are all the leaders of the world's great nations, and naturally, the renowned hotel is swarming with security so you'll have only a small part of your usual equipment. None of these notabilities are your target. The Austrian terrorist, who named himself 'Julian', is planning to blow up the hotel. If successful, it will change the world forever.   'Julian' is your target. We don't know how he looks so you'll have to get in touch with Jackie Carrington, your contact. She'll let you instructions on a note with your room keycard at the reception. You're registered as Tobias Reaper. Normally we would not care about the leaders, but preventing the attack will make us popular with many governments and could mean a new clientele for our business. Our customer has requested to secure the hotel so your objectives are clear : find Julian and defuse the bomb. We think the bomb will explode at 8 PM, so you only have 30 minutes to prevent the explosion.Good luck 47. Mission created by Kercyx based on the original Hitman: Codename 47 game. Are you ready for a real challenge?
